tuv.seg: Employment rights legislation: inspection and compliance
Reachtaíocht um chearta fostaíochta: iniúchadh agus comhlíonadh
The Workplace Relations Commission (WRC) aims to secure compliance with employment rights legislation through inspection and prosecution services
Tá sé mar aidhm ag an gCoimisiún um Chaidreamh san Áit Oibre (WRC) comhlíonadh le reachtaíocht um chearta fostaíochta a dhaingniú trí sheirbhísí iniúchta agus ionchúisimh
These services were formerly operated by the National Employment Rights Authority (NERA)
An tÚdarás Náisiúnta um Chearta Fostaíochta (NERA) a chuireann na seirbhísí sin i bhfeidhm go foirmiúil

Under the Workplace Relations Act 2015, which came into effect on 1 October 2015, the WRC monitors employment conditions through its Inspection Services to ensure the compliance and enforcement of employment rights legislation

Faoin Acht um Chaidreamh san Áit Oibre 2015, a tháinig i bhfeidhm an 1 Deireadh Fómhair 2015, déanann an WRC monatóireacht ar choinníollacha fostaíochta trína Seirbhísí Cigireachta chun comhlíonadh agus cur i bhfeidhm na reachtaíochta cearta fostaíochta a áirithiú
The WRC's Inspection Services have the power to carry out employment rights compliance inspections in relation to the following legislation:
Tá sé de chumhacht ag Seirbhísí Iniúchta an WRC cigireachtaí comhlíonta cearta fostaíochta a dhéanamh maidir leis an reachtaíocht seo a leanas:
• Organisation of Working Time Act 1997
• An tAcht um Eagrú Ama Oibre 1997
• Payment of Wages Act 1991
• An tAcht um Íoc Pá 1991
• Protection of Young Persons (Employment) Act 1996
• An tAcht um Chosaint Daoine Óga (Fostaíocht), 1996
• National Minimum Wage Act 2000
• An tAcht um Pá Íosta Náisiúnta 2000
• Parental Leave Acts 1998 and 2006
• Na hAchtanna um Shaoire do Thuismitheoirí, 1998 agus 2006
• Redundancy Payments Acts 1967–2014
• Na hAchtanna um Íocaíochtaí Iomarcaíochta, 1967–2014
• Employment Agency Act 1971
• An tAcht um Ghníomhaireacht Fostaíochta 1971
• Protection of Employment Act 1977–2007
• An tAcht um Chosaint Fostaíochta 1977–2007
• Protection of Employees (Employers' Insolvency) Acts 1984–2003
• Na hAchtanna um Chosaint Fostaithe (Dócmhainneacht Fostóirí) 1984–2003
• Carer's Leave Act 2001
• An tAcht um Shaoire Cúramóra 2001
• Employees (Provision of Information and Consultation) Act 2006
• An tAcht um Fhostaithe (Faisnéis agus Comhchomhairle a Sholáthar) 2006
• Employment Permits Acts 2003–2014
• Achtanna um Cheadanna Fostaíochta 2003–2014
Inspectors may enter premises at reasonable times, interview employers and employees, take statements, examine and take copies of records and initiate legal proceedings
Féadfaidh cigirí dul isteach chuig áitreabh ag amanna réasúnta, fostóirí agus fostaithe a chur faoi agallamh, cóipeanna a dhéanamh do thaifid agus iad a scrúdú agus tús a chur le himeachtaí dlí
If necessary, inspectors may be accompanied by other inspectors or the Gardaí
Má bhíonn gá leis, féadfaidh cigirí eile nó na Gardaí a bheith i dteannta an chigire
They may apply to the District Court for search warrants
Féadfaidh siad iarratas a dhéanamh chuig an gCúirt Dúiche chun barántas cuardaigh a fháil
You can read this employer’s guide to inspections (pdf)
Féadfaidh tú an treoir d’fhostóirí maidir le cigireachtaí (pdf) seo a léamh
Inspections are either carried out to investigate a specific complaint, or else a team of inspectors may carry out random or targeted inspections in a particular sector of employment
Déantar cigireachtaí d’fhonn gearán ar leith a fhiosrú, nó is féidir le foireann cigirí cigireachtaí randamacha agus dírithe a dhéanamh in earnáil fostaíochta ar leith
Where an initial inspection of records finds that that there have been breaches of employment law, the Inspection Services may:
Sa chás ina fhaightear amach go bhfuil sáruithe fostaíochta dlí ann, féadfaidh na Seirbhísí Cigireachta na rudaí seo a leanas a dhéanamh:
• Issue a letter asking the employer to correct this or
• Litir a eisiúint ag iarraidh ar an bhfostóir é sin a chur ina cheart
• Refer the matter to legal services for prosecution or
• An t-ábhar a tharchur chuig seirbhísí dlí lena ionchúiseamh nó
• Carry out a further inspection
• Tuilleadh cigireachtaí a dhéanamh
In the case of unpaid wages due to an employee, a letter is then sent requesting evidence that the employer is complying with the law as instructed
I gcás pá atá dlite d’fhostaí nár íocadh, seoltar litir ag lorg fianaise go bhfuil an fostóir ag cloí leis an dlí i gcomhréir le treoracha

If there is no response or an inadequate response to the letter, a second inspection follows together with a warning that any further or new breaches discovered will be sent to legal services to prosecute

Mura bhfaightear freagra nó má fhaightear freagra leordhóthanach ar an litir, déantar an dara cigireacht mar aon le foláireamh go ndéanfar aon sárú nua bhreise a fhaightear a sheoladh chuig seirbhísí dlí lena ionchúiseamh
An exception to the above procedures occurs where breaches of the Protection of Young Persons (Employment) Act 1996 are found
Eisceacht leis an méid thuas is ea an nós imeachta thuas nuair a fhaightear sáruithe ar an Acht um Dhaoine Óga a Chosaint (Fostaíocht) 1996
These are referred for prosecution after a first inspection
Déantar iad sin a tharchur lena n-ionchúiseamh i ndiaidh an chéad chigireachta
Inspectors are empowered to work in Joint Investigation Units with the Department of Social Protection and the Revenue Commissioners, and to exchange information with these bodies
Tá de chumhacht ag cigirí a bheith ag obair in gComh-aonaid Chigireachta leis an Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí agus leis na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim, agus eolas a mhalartú leis an dá chomhlacht sin
Under the Workplace Relations Act 2015, the WRC has the power under a number of employment laws to bring summary prosecutions against employers who are alleged to be in breach of the law
Faoin Acht um Chaidreamh san Áit Oibre 2015, tá cumhacht ag an WRC faoi roinnt dlíthe fostaíochta ionchúisimh achoimre a thabhairt i gcoinne fostóirí atá líomhnaithe a bheith ag sárú an dlí

The Act provides that, where a person is convicted of an offence under it, the court must order that person to pay the WRC the costs and expenses incurred by it in relation to the investigation, detection and prosecution of the offence, unless the court is satisfied that there are special and substantial reasons for not doing this

Foráiltear leis an Acht, nuair a chiontaítear duine i gcion faoin Acht, go gcaithfidh an chúirt ordú ar an duine sin na costais agus na speansais a tabhaíodh i ndáil leis an imscrúdú, brath agus ionchúiseamh an chiona a íoc, mura bhfuil an chúirt sásta go bhfuil cúiseanna speisialta agus suntasacha ann nach ndearnadh amhlaidh

However, this requirement to pay costs and expenses does not apply to the offence of refusing or failing to pay compensation when ordered to do so by the District Court, when that court is enforcing a decision of an adjudication officer or the Labour Court

Níl feidhm ag an riachtanas sin costais agus speansais a íoc leis an gcion diúltú nó mainneachtain cúiteamh a íoc nuair a ordaíonn an Chúirt Dúiche sin, nuair atá an chúirt sin ag forfheidhmiú cinnidh de chuid oifigigh bhreithnithe nó na Cúirte Oibreachais
The Act provides for the serving of compliance notices on employers, which is a new procedure
Foráiltear leis an Acht fógraí comhlíonta a sheirbheáil ar fhostóirí, agus is nós imeachta nua é sin
An inspector may serve a compliance notice on an employer if satisfied that a contravention of the relevant legislation has occurred
Féadfaidh an cigire fógra comhlíonta a sheirbheáil ar fhostóir má bhíonn sé/sí sásta gur tharla sárú ar an reachtaíocht ábhartha
This notice specifies how that contravention is to be rectified
Sonraíonn an fógra sin conas is féidir an sárú sin a chur ina cheart
An employer may appeal against the compliance notice to the Labour Court within 42 days
Féadfaidh fostóir achomharc a dhéanamh i gcoinne fógra comhlíonta chuig an gCúirt Oibreachais laistigh de 42 lá
There is a further appeal from the decision of the Labour Court to the Circuit Court
Tá achomharc eile ann ó chinneadh na Cúirte Oibreachais go dtí a Chúirt Dúiche
It is an offence for an employer to fail to comply with a compliance notice
Is cion é d’fhostóirí mainneachtain cloí le fógra comhlíonta
The existence of a compliance notice or any dispute about it does not prevent employees from taking action in relation to any alleged breach of employment law in respect of them
Ní chuireann fógra comhlíonta nó aon díospóid mar gheall air stop le fostaithe dul i mbun gnímh maidir le haon sárú dlí fostaíochta líomhnaithe a tharla i ndáil leo
Neither does it prevent any prosecution for an offence under employment laws
Ní chuireann sé cosc ach an oiread ar ionchúiseamh maidir le cion faoi dhlíthe fostaíochta
Compliance notices may be used in relation to breaches of the legislation listed in Schedule 4 of the Workplace Relations Act 2015
D’fhéadfaí fógraí comhlíonta a úsáid maidir le sáruithe ar an reachtaíocht arna liostáil i Sceideal 4 den Acht um Chaidreamh san Áit Oibre
The Act provides for using fixed payment notices for certain offences, which is also a new procedure
Foráiltear leis an Acht úsáid fógraí íocaíochtaí seasta i leith cionta ar leith, agus is nós imeachta nua é sin chomh maith
Inspectors may issue fixed payment notices for amounts up to €2,000 where they have reasonable cause to believe that a person has committed a relevant offence
Féadfaidh cigirí fógraí íocaíochtaí seasta suas go dtí €2,000 a eisiúint áit a mbíonn cúis mhaith acu a chreidiúint go bhfuil cion ábhartha déanta ag duine
The fine must be paid within 42 days
Ní mór an fhíneáil a íoc laistigh de 42 lá
The relevant offences are:
Seo a leanas na cionta ábhartha:
• Breaches of the obligation on employers to consult representatives of employees and to provide information to them under the Protection of Employment Act 1977 (collective redundancies)
• Sárú ar an gceanglas ar fhostaithe dul i gcomhairle le hionadaithe fostaithe agus eolas a chur ar fáil dóibh faoi Acht um Chosaint Fostaíochta (Iomarcaíochtaí carntha) 1977
• Failure to provide a statement of wages and deductions from wages under the Payment of Wages Act 1991, or
• Mainneachtain ráiteas pá agus asbhaintí as do phá a chur ar fáil faoin Acht um Íoc Pá 1991, nó
• Failure to provide an employee with a statement of the average hourly rate of pay for a pay reference period under the National Minimum Wage Act 2000
• Mainneachtain ráiteas leis an ngnáthráta pá san uair a chur ar fáil d’fhostaí maidir le tréimhse tagartha pá faoin Acht um Pá Íosta Náisiúnta 2000
If you wish to make a complaint about your employment rights you must use the online complaint form available on workplacerelations.ie
Más mian leat gearán a dhéanamh faoi do chearta fostaíochta ní mór duit an fhoirm ghearáin ar líne a úsáid atá ar fáil ar workplacerelations.ie)
